meanings.sent1: The colorers used bright markers to decorate the poster.
meanings.sent2: The colorers in the art class enjoyed mixing different shades to create new colors.
meanings.sent3: The colorers had a competition to see who could color the fastest without going outside the lines.
meanings.sent4: The colorers transformed the plain wall into a vibrant masterpiece with their artistic skills.
meanings.sent5: The colorers carefully selected the perfect hues to bring life to the black and white drawing.

meanings.sent1: The group of colorers worked together to complete the mural on time.
meanings.sent2: The colorers gathered all their supplies before starting the coloring project.
meanings.sent3: The colorers celebrated their successful completion of the task with a colorful party.
meanings.sent4: The colorers stood out in the crowd with their vibrant attire and cheerful personalities.
meanings.sent5: The colorers' teamwork and dedication resulted in a beautifully colored masterpiece.
